entry.title: Grapevine 5.0 Beta 1
entry.summary: The second beta version of Grapevine 5.0 was uploaded to NuGet.org today, December 28, 2020. Here are some updated code samples to start playing around with.

entry.title: Grapevine Docs
entry.summary: I'm using Docusaurus 2 to generate the Grapevine documentation. It can be found in it's own repository, grapevine-docs. I'm still configuring the generator, so you will still see some of the default content for a while until it's all cleaned up.

entry.title: Grapevine 5.0 Beta 0
entry.summary: The first beta version of Grapevine 5.0 was uploaded to NuGet.org today, December 25, 2020.
